message: I have a unique opportunity to sell you an exceptional product, and I'm excited to share it with you. I believe you'll find it valuable, and I'm willing to offer it to you at a price that I think is fair. My initial offer is $14000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. I'm interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

I understand that $11000 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you a discount, but I need to make sure I'm still getting a good price for the product. My revised offer is $13000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11500 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle this time.

I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to ensure I'm getting a price that reflects the product's value. I can offer you a slight discount, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $12500. This is a fair price, considering the product's worth to you.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.

I've made significant concessions, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $12000. This is the lowest price I can offer, and it's still a great deal for you. I'm willing to meet you at this price, but I need a commitment from you. My final offer is $12000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $12000, but I'm still $2000 above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product. I'm hoping we can find a compromise.

I've already made significant concessions, and I'm not willing to go any lower than $12000. I'm starting to think that we're not going to meet in the middle, and I'm considering other options. However, I'm still willing to make one last effort to find a mutually beneficial price. My final offer is $12000, and I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'm adding a 1-year warranty and a premium support package. This is my last offer.
